title: 65 Perches Lagoon Front Property For Immediate Sale
details:
Land Ref: Wadiya 65

This is a beautiful 65 perches lagoon front property that is facing the Puttalam lagoon and is located just a km from the Kalpitiya town.

The property is located in a serine environment away from the town and is populated with over a dozen coconut trees and presents a beautiful view of the lagoon. Waking up to the beauty of the rising sun and the view of the tiny fishing boats dotted on the majestic blue lagoon at dawn gives you a sense of refreshment and peace.

Kalpitiya is an upcoming tourist destination and due to so much demand for land, it is increasingly becoming difficult to find a small plot of this nature, specially with clear documents. This is a fantastic opportunity not to be missed for people seeking to acquire a property at Kalpitiya.

The land is ideal for a holiday home or a get away bungalow and comes with very clear documents.

Now available for immediate sale with-

- Clear Deed And Title
- Good Road Access
- Electricity
- Water
- Fully Fenced

Asking price is LKR 150,000/perch

If interested please contact us on 0094 77 77 33 823 for further details.

Thanks for looking :)
